content: e row 13 remove the established stitch pattern according to chart temporary bor marker cut cc and knit to the b please note that the first repeat of the end of needle 2 with mc pattern starts at stitch 2 of the chart switch to smaller needles if desired work in on needle 2 i e the sole k2tog and knit to stockinette stitch until foot measures the end of the needle approximately 3 5 4 4 cm / 1⅜ 1⅝ 1⅝ inches less than the desired final length there are now 31 31 37 sts in the sole and 29 35 35 sts in the instep chart e chart key karjalan neito socks page 4/5 toe abbreviations redistribute sts for each size as follows bor - beginning of round cc - contrast colour size s slip the first st of needle 2 onto needle k - knit 1 there are now 30 sts on each needle ktbl - knit through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 sts together size m slip the first and last st of needle 1 lhn - left hand needle onto needle 2 there are now 33 sts on each ll1 - lifted left increase see technical tips needle for the twisted version lr1 - lifted right increase see technical tips size l slip the first st of needle 2 onto needle for the twisted version 1 there are now 36 sts on each needle mc - main colour m1 2 3 4 - stitch marker 1 2 3 4 m1l - make a left leaning increase work the toe decreases as follows p - purl pm - place marker round 1 on needle 1 *k0 k1 k0 ssk knit until p2tog - purl 2 sts together 3 sts remain k2tog k1* repeat * - * on rhn - right hand needle needle 2 round s - round s round 2 knit rs - right side sl - slip purlwise repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 20 21 24 sts sm - slip marker remain on each needle finishing with round 2 ssk - slip slip knit then repeat only round 1 until 10 11 12 sts st s - stitch es remain on each needle ws - wrong side yo - yarn over cut the yarn and graft the toe finishing technical tips soak the socks in lukewarm water and remove lateral a k a vikkel braid excess water by rolling the socks in a towel https //www youtube com/watch v=nrzr5ex let dry flat or on sock blockers weave in z6vy&t=92s ends working a twisted lr1 insert the tip of the lhn into the right leg of the twisted stitch one row below the first stitch on lhn from back to front knit the picked-up stitch through the front loop so that it twists to the right working a twisted ll1 insert the tip of the lhn into the left leg of the twisted stitch two row below the last worked stitch on
